query:
query getQuoteBySymbol($symbol: String, $locale: String) {
  getQuoteBySymbol(symbol: $symbol, locale: $locale) {
    symbol
    name
    price
    priceChange
    percentChange
    exShortName
    exchangeCode
    openPrice
    dayHigh
    dayLow
    prevClose
    dividendFrequency
    dividendYield
    dividendAmount
    dividendCurrency
    weeks52high
    weeks52low
    __typename
  }
}
